comment.1: The default pattern defines properties that may be changed by a specific pattern
comment.2: adjust volume using accents (from 0 to 9) at each pattern step
comment.4: steps repeat, e.g. '563' becomes '56356356' and  '.!' becomes '.!.!.!.!' for 8 steps pattern
comment.5: text pattern may contain only '.' - silence, '!' - drum hit
